feed.title: Google Cloud: Oracle Database@Google Cloud
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Oracle Database@Google Cloud

entry.content:
Oracle Database@Google Cloud supports region `asia-northeast1` (Tokyo, Japan).
For a full list of supported locations, see [Regional availability](https://cloud.google.com/oracle/database/docs/available-configurations#regions)
entry.summary: Oracle Database@Google Cloud now supports the `asia-northeast1` region in Tokyo, Japan, expanding its global availability. For a comprehensive list of supported locations, please refer to the official documentation on regional availability.
entry.title: Feature: Oracle Database@Google Cloud Now Available in Tokyo
